t: Number of Amazon Go locations in the USA in 2025 | ScrapeHero
s: 2 weeks ago - There are 17 Amazon Go locations in the United States as of May 14, 2025. The state/territory with the most number of Amazon Go locations in the US is Washington with 8 locations, which is 47% of all Amazon Go locations in America.

t: Amazon's Just Walk Out stores relied on '1,000 people in India watching,' not AI - Washington Times
s: May 6, 2024 - While Amazon's Just Walk Out technology at its Fresh grocery stores was touted as being powered by artificial intelligence, a new report says it actually relied heavily on manual monitoring by some 1,000 people in India.
